thread.title: Justin Bieber's New Single 'Sorry' to Arrive This Week
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's New Single 'Sorry' to Arrive This Week

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber's New Single 'Sorry' to Arrive This Week
text:
Comments A collaboration with Skrillex and Blood Diamond, the song is coming out on Friday, October 23. 
Justin Bieber is sharing a new cut off " Purpose " ahead of the album's release next month. Called "Sorry", the song which will also feature contributions from Skrillex and Blood Diamond is due out on Friday, October 23. Bieber started teasing the track with an Instagram image he posted on late Sunday night, October 18. "#sorry5days," he simply wrote in the caption. On Monday, he shared another teaser via Twitter. "New song. Biggest one yet? #sorry4days," he said alongside a black-and-white photo of him shirtless. A photo posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Oct 18, 2015 at 7:54pm PDT — Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) October 19, 2015 "Sorry" will presumably serve as the next single from Bieber's much-anticipated new album, which is scheduled for November 13. The LP has also been preceded by lead cut "What Do You Mean?" that arrived in late August and has peaked at No. 1 on Billboard Hot 100. Ariana Grande recently jumped on the official remix of the smashing hit. The version is available for everyone who pre-orders "Purpose" on iTunes.
